body: Well if your childhood friend won't listen to you anymore you know what you got to do pb I know a lot of you don't know what that means but in my terms that means Payback for sure so you know what you do you go out bang her mom dig up some info on that dick head see if he has any loved ones that he cares about and respects then bang them 10 frame that fucking roach then the relative that you bangs visit him in the jail with her we had a good time while you were away
